Since the 1990s of last century, following expanding of developing to the outside and continual and steady economy development, the exhibition industry to the outside and continual and steady economy development, the exhibition industry of China develops quickly and becomes a new point of growth of national economy, especially after China becoming one of the WTO members, the international trade grows fast and so does the exhibition industry. But compared with developed countries and regions of exhibition industry of the world, the exhibition of China exists a great deal of insufficient. Strengthening the deep comparative advantage research to the exhibition industry and leading the exhibition industry of China.
 According to the development situation of the exhibition industry of China, this paper first gives the development summaries of the exhibition industry, including definition, features and the situation of other countries, then goes to investigate the influence of the WTO policy to exhibition industry of China, and the main condition of the development of exhibition industry in China with statistics. Next according to the basic comparative advantage theory of international trade, this paper stresses its analysis on the comparison of exhibition industry development between China and the exhibition giant Germany, through four parts like outside conditions. scale and speed, hardware aspect and software aspect. The conclusion is that China does have potential comparative advantages on exhibition industry. And at the last this paper, it gives out some advice on how to develop the potential comparative advantage of exhibition industry in China.In the 21st century, the modern service industry is developing rapidly and replacing the content of the traditional service industry in the trade of economic globalization and unification. 제목: 한국 무역전시 국고보조금의 무역효과 및 경제적 파급효과
초록:
This study is purposed to draw the trade effect and the economic ripple effect of the government subsidy supported for trade exhibitions, especially for brand exhibitions, and to suggest a new policy for the government subsidy for trade exhibition in this time when the importance of trade exhibition business in the export trade is becoming increasingly large. 
The result showed a very large effect including KRW1377.8million for trade effect and KRW185,592.7million for production induction, KRW81,789.6million for induction of additional value, KRW20,450.0million for income increase, and 2,376person for employment creation among the economic ripple effects(7 brand exhibitions). 
This result is considered to be highly qualified for its academic contributions because it can be used for expansion of the government subsidy for brand exhibitions and domestic exhibitions and for supplement of the subsidy support policy.This study is purposed to draw the trade effect and the economic ripple effect of the government subsidy supported for trade exhibitions, especially for brand exhibitions, and to suggest a new policy for the government subsidy for trade exhibition in this time when the importance of trade exhibition business in the export trade is becoming increasingly large. 
The result showed a very large effect including KRW1377.8million for trade effect and KRW185,592.7million for production induction, KRW81,789.6million for induction of additional value, KRW20,450.0million for income increase, and 2,376person for employment creation among the economic ripple effects(7 brand exhibitions). 
This result is considered to be highly qualified for its academic contributions because it can be used for expansion of the government subsidy for brand exhibitions and domestic exhibitions and for supplement of the subsidy support policy.Government Subsidy, Trade Effect, Economic Ripple Effect, Brand Exhibitions

제목: 글로벌 무역환경 변화에 따른 우리나라 대학의선진형 무역전문인력 양성방안에 관한 연구
초록:
Our country's sustainable trade growth fundamentally depends on the supply of excellent labors called global trade expert. He or she is required several knowledge and skills not only trade, marketing, information technology, foreign languages but also global mind. Universities have to supply excellent global trade expert to companies according to needs and wants.
The object of this paper is to propose some ideas for training of global trade expert of Korea university under global trade environment.
First, global companies prefer labors who have not only some skills about specialty and communication skill but also personality on passion, creativity, leadership and so on.
Second, The university's curriculum needs to improved in terms of "convergence" and "specialty". In nature, trade major treats lots of subjects such as trade, business adminstration, economics, international law, international commerce, logistics, marketing, etc to catch up changing global business circumstances and companies' needs. Therefore convergence of adjacent field is very important in study and training.
Finally, Universities need to use field-specialist to supplement of trade working experience as instructors and practitioners. The concept of convergence and specialty is not separated but harmonious each other.Global Trade Expert Program, Curriculum of Trade and International Business, Personality, Convergence

제목: 미국 무역전시산업의 국제경쟁력에 관한 연구 : 한국 무역전시산업의 시사점 도출
초록: This study aims at making full use of operation know-how of U.S. exhibition industry by analyzing institutions and education systems related to the trade exhibition industry of the U.S., one of the world's leading countries in the sector and comparing with those of South Korea. It found out that operation know-how of U.S. trade exhibition industry that takes up almost 1% of overall GDP of the U.S. was created by specialized pragmatic human resources training such as CEM, outstanding exhibition marketing ability, abundant nature & tourism environment, inexpensive room charge and rental, well-equipped entertainment including internet environment.Exhibition Industry, Trade Exhibition, International Competitiveness

제목: 지역무역협정(RTA)과 국가 간 무역량 결정요인분석
초록:
Using the gravitymodel, this paper analyzes empirically howtheworld trade in goods is affected by regional trade agreements(RTAs) which have been spreading rapidly since themid-1990s. This paper attempt to do the panel data analysis about 174 countries during the period of 1994-2008. These panel data include 157 RTAs. It ismeaningful that this paper uses comprehensive data to analyze the net effect of regional trade agreements on the global trade volume.
This provides a clue as to the answer to the stumbling block debate raised early in the regional trade agreement. Also, confirming howthe participation of the WTOaffected the trade volume among themember countries, theWTO-related dummy variables are additionally introduced to this gravitymodel. And as far aswe know, the state system-related variables is first considered in thismodel.
This variable reflects the social and cultural environments of countries as the proxy variable representing the sociocultural homogeneity. In all regressions, joining to theWTOand consistency of the state systemhave a positive effect on increasing the trade volumes between countries. According to the analysis of RTA trade effects, RTAs, on average, increase the volume of trade within the RTA region by 27%～37%, and decrease the volume of trade between the regional and the non-regional nation by 1.2%～3.4%.Therefore, the net effect of regional trade agreements on the promotion of global welfare is positive.
For robustness check, we also introduce the interaction term of the dummy variable which reflects the RTA tightening and the continuous variable which reflects the distance effect. As a result, the RTAs alleviate the trade-decreasing effect which is caused by the distance between the countries.Regional TradeAgreements, TradeCreationEffects, TradeDiversion Effects, Gravity Model, Goods Trade

제목: 동북아국가의 무역업무 재설계와전자무역추진현황-전자통관을 중심으로-
초록:
이상과 같이 동북아 국가들로서 한국, 중국, 대만, 일본의 전자통관시스템을 살펴보았는데 한국과 일본의 경우 단일창구화의 개념에 따라 체계적으로 전자통관시스템이 구축되고 있다고 판단되지만 대만은 무역관리차원에서 통관시스템이 운용되고 있고 중국의 경우 대통관제도를 도입하여 전자통관을 도모하고 있으나 사업의 초창기이기 때문에 그 자세한 내용은 알 수 없다. 통관절차의 단일창구화를 통해서 국가적인 차원에서도 이익을 향유할 수 있지만 수출입업자측에서 많은 도움이 될 수 있기 때문에 동북아차원에서 체계적인 접근이 필요하다.동북아국가들의 전자통관시스템의 현황을 살펴본 결과 그 시사점으로서는 첫째, 동북아 국가간에 전자통관에 대한 체계적인 논의없이 개별국가차원에서 독자적으로 진행되고 있다. 둘째, 동북아국가들의 통관시스템은 타국의 통관시스템과의 통관정보 공유를 위한 시스템의 연계가 추진되지 않고 있다는 점이다. 셋째, 전자통관으로 제출되는 서류가 제한되어 있다. 특히 전자선화증권은 도입이 되지 않아 전자적으로 처리할 수도 없다. 넷째, 전자통관시스템의 구축에 사용자의 니즈를 제대로 반영하지 않고 있다. 다섯째, 다섯째, 전자통관을 통한 위험관리기능에 대한 체계적인 접근이 미흡하다.동북아 전자통관시스템의 발전방안으로서 첫째, 동북아 국가간에 전자통관에 대한 체계적인 논의를 통한 전자통관의 모델을 개발한 후에 이를 개별국가에 적용하여야 한다. 둘째, 동북아국가간의 통관정보시스템의 연계를 통한 동북아국가간의 무역에서 통관처리의 신속성, 정확성, 효율성을 제고할 필요가 있다. 셋째, 통관관련 전체서류가 전자적으로 제출될 수 있도록 하여야 할 필요성이 있다. 특히 전자선화증권의 경우에는 조속히 도입될 필요가 있다. 넷째, 전자통관시스템의 구축에 사용자니즈를 반영하여 고객의 편리성을 제고할 필요가 있다. 다섯째, 전자통관을 통한 위험관리기능을 강화하여야 한다. 그리고 한국의 경우에는 무역업무와 통관업무가 각각 단일창구를 추진하고 있기 때문에 향후 완전한 단일창구화를 완성하는 것이 어려울 것으로 판단된다.Northeast Asia Nations introduced each single window system for simplifying the customs clearance procedures in order to prevent the rekeying the customs and trade-related data. A single window is a means for enabling users to complete all the necessary import/export procedures in a single input and by single transmission by linking the related system.
WCO recommends CDM, UCR, ACI that completed by WCO's own projects for assist to establish the single window for customs clearance. Northeast Asia Nations such as Korea, China, Taiwan, Japan undertook trade process reengineering for introducing single window for customs clearance. Korea and Japan introduced a e-customs systems as a good single window system.
The purpose of this paper is to contribute to construction of the efficient single window system for customs clearance by studying e-customs cases in Northeast Asia Nations.Northeast Asia Nations introduced each single window system for simplifying the customs clearance procedures in order to prevent the rekeying the customs and trade-related data. A single window is a means for enabling users to complete all the necessary import/export procedures in a single input and by single transmission by linking the related system.
WCO recommends CDM, UCR, ACI that completed by WCO's own projects for assist to establish the single window for customs clearance. Northeast Asia Nations such as Korea, China, Taiwan, Japan undertook trade process reengineering for introducing single window for customs clearance. Korea and Japan introduced a e-customs systems as a good single window system.
The purpose of this paper is to contribute to construction of the efficient single window system for customs clearance by studying e-customs cases in Northeast Asia Nations.Trade Process Reengineering, e-Trade, e-Customs, Northeast Asia Nations

제목: 煙臺近代貿易과 都市發展(1861-1910) -인구와 무역관련 산업을 중심으로-
초록:
본 고에서 연대를 연구대상으로 삼은 주된 이유는 연대가 산동 근대사와 중국 근대사를 이해하는데 중요한 지역이기 때문이다. 무역과 연대발전의 상호관계에 대한 고찰은 여러 가지 측면이 있지만 그 가운데 인구의 증가양상과 무역관련 산업의 발전은 가장 대표적인 요소이다. 무역과 연대발전의 관계를 분석함으로써 근대 개항장 중의 하나인 연대의 특성을 파악하는 것이 본고의 주제이다.
결론적으로 보면, 연대의 발전은 무역과 매우 밀접한 관계가 있다. 무역의 발전 속도는 연대의 발전을 좌우하였을 뿐만 아니라 무역의 성격도 연대의 발전에 큰 영향을 끼쳤다. 이와 동시에 연대의 발전은 연대무역의 성장과 성격의 형성에 영향을 미치기도 하였다. 무역과 도시의 상호연관성으로 인해 국내 남북무역망과 국제 동서무역망의 교차점인 연대는 독특한 특성을 가지게 되었다.本文以煙臺作為研究對象的根本原因在於煙臺是山東近代史和中國近代史研究的重要區域. 針對煙臺近代貿易與城市發展的相互關係研究有諸多層面, 但人口的增長變化及對貿易相關產業研究無疑是最具有代表性的. 因此, 本文的研究目的旨在通過對貿易與煙臺發展關係的考察, 來探究近代通商口岸煙臺的特點.
通過筆者的分析可知, 煙臺的成長與貿易的發展有著極為密切的關係. 貿易的發展速度不僅左右著煙臺的發展, 而且貿易的結構特點也對煙臺城市的發展起了很大的作用. 與此同時, 煙臺的發展也對煙臺貿易的發展產生了深遠的影響. 貿易與煙臺發展的相互作用使位於中國南北貿易網和國際東西貿易網交匯點上的煙臺具有了自身的特點.煙臺, 煙台, 貿易發展, 人口，手工業, 金融業, 通信業, Yantai(Chefoo), Trade development, Population, Handicraft industry, Banking business, Communication industry煙臺, 煙台, 貿易發展, 人口, 手工業, 金融業, 通信業, Yantai(Chefoo), Trade development, Population, Handicraft industry, Banking business, Communication industry

제목: 21세기 韓國貿易의 뉴 패러다임 複合貿易
초록:
The purpose of this paper is to propose a new trade strategy of Korea in 21st century to be called the total integrated trade (TIT). Korea's trade promotion activities have grown to be big and inefficient patched rags. In order to overcome the limits of the current trade promotion system, it is necessary to integrate individual trade strategies to make a compound and efficient total system that is more efficient than sum of individual ones, which is the fundamental concept of TIT
 The specific suggestion of this paper to implement TIT is to reform existing legal and institutional subsystems to make a 'Comprehensive Trade Act' which would resolve conflicts of separate subsystems. As a stepping stone to realize this final model, communications and cooperations among the officials in charge are urgently needed. Successful fulfillment of TIT spirit would play a key role in achieving another economic miracle in Korea.The purpose of this paper is to propose a new trade strategy of Korea in 21st century to be called the total integrated trade (TIT). As a stepping stone to realize this final model, communications and cooperations among the officials in charge are urgently needed. Successful fulfillment of TIT spirit would play a key role in achieving another economic miracle in Korea.Total Integrated Strategy(TIT), Korea Trade,Trade Policy, New Paradigm for Trade Policy

제목: WTO허용보조금으로서의 무역전시국고지원자금의 효율적 운영을 위한 한국의 무역전시사업의 경제적 효과 분석
초록:
This paper aims at searching some plans in order to operate governmental subsidies for domestic trade exhibition, which WTO system permitts as non-actionable subsidies, more effectively.
 The writter submits the following plans for more effective operation of governmental subsidies : a) submitting scientific and reasonable standards in case when government(MOCIE) will decide the organizers which will be supported from the nation, b) performing the operation management against such organizers more strictly, c) supporting such subsidies to the promising organizers which have the feasibility to able to grow as hub of trade exhibition in northeast asia, d) supporting national fund in order to make Korea's trade exhibition organizer induce to be more large scale, specialist, international one, and e) educating some academic association, for example KATIS, which has an ability to research the national support trade exhibitionThis paper aims at searching some plans in order to operate governmental subsidies for domestic trade exhibition, which WTO system permitts as non-actionable subsidies, more effectively.

제목: 무역 e-마켓플레이스에 대한 현황 및 발전방향
초록:
최근의 정보기술의 발달은 국제무역에 상당한 영향을 미치고 있다. e-마켓플레이스는 구매와 판매와 관련된 모든 것을 제공하는 가상시장이다. 무역 e-마켓플레이스는 한국에서 국제무역을 수행하는데 있어서 매우 중요한 역할을 수행하고 있다.
한국의 무역 e-마켓플레이스는 국제경쟁과 성공적인 사업모델의 관점에서 많은 문제점을 직면하고 있다.
본 논문은 무역 e-마켓플레이스의 개념, 특징, 형태 그리고 현재의 상황 그리고 문제점과 해결방안에 관하여 논의한다.
본 논문의 목적은 무역 e-마켓플레이스의 현황과 문제점을 분석하여 그 문제점에 대한 해결방안을 제시함으로써 한국의 무역 e-마켓플레이스의 활성화에 기여하는 것이다.The recent advancement of information technology has impacted immensely on international trade. E-marketplace is a virtual market which offers everything regarding purchase and sales. And trade e-marketplace has been playing very important role in doing international trade in Korea. Korea trade e-marketplaces are facing many problems in view of global competition and successful business model.
This paper deals with the concept, features, types and present status and problems and solutions of trade e-Marketplace. The purpose of this paper is to contribute to the activation of Korean trade e-marketplace by analysing the current position and problems of trade e-marketplace and finding the its’ solution.The recent advancement of information technology has impacted immensely on international trade. 제목: 무역을 통한 외국지식의 확산과 한국 제조업부문의 노동생산성 성장에 관한 연구
초록:
The purpose of this paper is to investigate the extent to which technological knowledge that is created in five industrial countries influences through the trade flows on the growth of labor productivity at the manufacturing industry level of Korea. The four dynamic models are differentiated according to the channel of knowledge spillovers as well as the level of import penetration and industrial openness and specified by allowing a short-run and long-run impact of knowledge spillovers on the labor productivity. The models are estimated by using the panel data sets over the period 1992-1998 for total manufacturing industries as well as industry specific sectors that are disaggregated at the two-digit level of ISIC revision 3 and by adopting the general method of moments technique and instrumental variable approach.
The empirical results are as follows: The first, it is found that foreign technological knowledge have the relatively strong impact on the growth of labor productivity in the industries that exports are given much more weight and the openness levels are higher. In the case of industries that have much more weight in relying on the domestic market and maintain the lower level of openness, it is shown that the impact of foreign knowledge spillovers on the growth of labor productivity is significant if it is interacted with the openness industrial policy of government. The second, it is found that the magnitude of foreign knowledge spillovers has no significant relationship on the growth of labor productivity in the labor and capital intensive industries.The purpose of this paper is to investigate the extent to which technological knowledge that is created in five industrial countries influences through the trade flows on the growth of labor productivity at the manufacturing industry level of Korea. The four dynamic models are differentiated according to the channel of knowledge spillovers as well as the level of import penetration and industrial openness and specified by allowing a short-run and long-run impact of knowledge spillovers on the labor productivity. The models are estimated by using the panel data sets over the period 1992-1998 for total manufacturing industries as well as industry specific sectors that are disaggregated at the two-digit level of ISIC revision 3 and by adopting the general method of moments technique and instrumental variable approach.

The second, it is found that the magnitude of foreign knowledge spillovers has no significant relationship on the growth of labor productivity in the labor and capital intensive industries.Trade, Knowledge Spillovers, Labor Productivity Growth, R&D Stock

제목: 무역전문인력 양성과 관련한 대학교육의 문제점과 대처방안
초록: Foreign Trade Specialists, Foreign Trade, Foreign Trade Department.

초록: Global Business Experts, Collaboration, Human Resources Development Strategy, Knowledge Portal Strategy

제목: 무역조정지원제도의 경제적 효과와 정책적 함의: 미국 TAA 프로그램 사례 연구
초록: This paper examines the political economy of compensation in the context of US trade policy. The purpose of the study lies in assessing the economic effect of US TAA program and deriving some practical policy implications out of it for the Korean government. Major contents of the program and its performance over 40 years are analyzed from both normative and positive perspectives. The best rationale for the program was sought for with the review of the existing evidence. Trade adjustment assistance, in the form of TAA, is likely to remain the chief channel by which displace workers in the United States are compensated for their losses brought by expanding freer trade. The results of the study could provide a useful information regarding the efficient introduction and operation of the TAA system in Korea.Trade Adjustment Assistance(TAA), Trade Readjustment Allowance, Wage Insurance, U.S. Trade Act of 2002

제목: 무역거래대금의 전자결제 활성화 요인에 관한 실증연구
초록:
In response to the problems and disadvantages of paper-based payment system and recent changes in payment method technology since the emergence of e-Trade, various electronic payment platforms such as BOLERO, Trade Card, e-payment plus, and Eleanor has been developed as a standard method of fund settlement in international trade by companies in many countries around the world. However, in Korea, the current situation is that most of its trading companies, financial institutions, and trade organizations still rely on paper-based payment system.
 It is by this reason that such electronic trade systems are mostly utilized in stages before the contract confirmations but not so much afterwards in payment stages. Moreover, it is also true that even the most of internationally acknowledged electronic payment platforms are not truly utilized globally due to the lack of internationally recognized systematic way of verification, implementation of law, legal system, and infrastructure. Hence, an empirical study is needed to run an inventory of the factors that cause changes in payment method for international trade and also to identify the factors that restricts trade companies when they try to choose and utilize of electronic payment system.
 To achieve such research goals, this study started by setting up a research model and research hypothesis derived from theoretical analysis related to electronic payment system for international trade. The following is the summary of result from this research:
 The basic materials used in this study are taken from the previous researches in relation to the electronic settlement system. As a way of facilitating the analysis of empirical study, this study set up nine hypotheses in order to find out the utilization factors of electronic payment. Among the nine hypotheses, all hypotheses were adopted except two hypotheses such as legal safety factor, trade financial factor. This point could be interpreted that the two factors are not directly related with the selection of electronic settlement. Deriving from above mentioned conclusions, here are the suggestions made by this study:
 First, Suggestions were made for international trade companies on practical factors that positively affect on implementation and utilization of electronic payment system. This is specially an important accomplishment since it gave a practical and tangible analysis on results of previous researches that were essentially only theoretical studies for prerequisites and initiative plan of electronic payment system.
 Second, By analyzing 9 factors formulated in this thesis, this study suggested a plan to enhance utilization of electronic payment system.
 Third, this study conducted empirical analysis focusing on electronic payment stages. By doing so, this study also laid a foundation for further studies on automation of other stages of international trade such as transportation and insurance.
 Fourth, this study illustrated that the factors that are exclusively pertained to the trade company itself have statistically more positive effect on implementation and utilization of electronic payment system.
 However, this study has is a limitation that it has not performed the practical effect and lever of electronic settlement.In response to the problems and disadvantages of paper-based payment system and recent changes in payment method technology since the emergence of e-Trade, various electronic payment platforms such as BOLERO, Trade Card, e-payment plus, and Eleanor has been developed as a standard method of fund settlement in international trade by companies in many countries around the world.  However, this study has is a limitation that it has not performed the practical effect and lever of electronic settlement.Electronic Payment, e-Trade, Facilitation Factor.

제목: 무역계약과 不一致하는 물품 輸入시의 關稅評價에 대한 考察
초록:
The Article Ⅶ of the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade 1994(WTO Customs Valuation Agreement) provides that when the actual goods delivered to the buyer are different from the goods listed on the trade agreement, the Customs valuation of the goods shall not be based upon the price actually paid or payable for the imported goods. Studies find that following modifications need to be made to the Customs valuation regulations regarding the issue.
 First, the Customs needs to have clear and concrete regulations to be applied to cases where the actual goods are incompatible with the trade contract. Second, the Customs needs to have clear standards and procedures to determine and prove the goods' "incompatibility" with the contract. Third, changes made to the goods' value due to the incompatibility need to be considered for Customs valuation even after the clearance is completed. Fourth, goods that have been scrapped with the approval of a Customs collector should not be subject to Customs valuation regardless of the incompatibility.The Article Ⅶ of the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade 1994(WTO Customs Valuation Agreement) provides that when the actual goods delivered to the buyer are different from the goods listed on the trade agreement, the Customs valuation of the goods shall not be based upon the price actually paid or payable for the imported goods. Studies find that following modifications need to be made to the Customs valuation regulations regarding the issue.
 First, the Customs needs to have clear and concrete regulations to be applied to cases where the actual goods are incompatible with the trade contract. Second, the Customs needs to have clear standards and procedures to determine and prove the goods' "incompatibility" with the contract. Third, changes made to the goods' value due to the incompatibility need to be considered for Customs valuation even after the clearance is completed. Fourth, goods that have been scrapped with the approval of a Customs collector should not be subject to Customs valuation regardless of the incompatibility.Trade Contract, Incompatibility With The Contract, Customs Valuation

제목: 무역인력의 조기경력개발계획 효과에 관한 실증연구
초록:
The objective of this paper is to discuss a feasibility of developing a early career development planning (CDP) for international trade students. The CDP has been recognized as an important method for advanced professionals but there is a few research works of using CDP for international trade professionals.
 Several meaningful research propositions are derived from this paper. First, prospective international trade professionals considers the CDP is very important because it gives his/her career prospects, career satisfaction and career committment. Second, individual career planning has positive effects on career tactics, career commitment, and career prospects which ultimately positively influenced on career development planning outcomes. Third, personal career commitment has been found as a crucial role for personal career execution. Therefore, organizational supportive framework for university graduates has to be implemented so that international trade professionals at his (or her) early career stage can increase the level of individual career commitment.
 This model helps to improve individual career competence in international trade area, and thus to increase the industrial competitiveness. Though the limitations of results in this study the suggested model would significantly reduce the structural gap between industry expectations and the quality level of university graduates.The objective of this paper is to discuss a feasibility of developing a early career development planning (CDP) for international trade students. 제목: 무역원활화와 국경안전 강화를 위한 세관과 업계의 협력 사례분석과 그 시사점
초록:
Each customs administration have to establish a partnership with the private sector in order to ensure the safety and security of the international trade supply chain.
 So, WCO developed a regime that will enhance the security and facilitation of international trade. This is the WCO Framework of Standards to Secure and Facilitation Global Trade.
 And developed countries devised and implemented Customs-Trade Partnership program, i.e. C-TPAT in U.S., PIP in Canada, StairSec in Sweden.
 The Customs-Trade Partnership programs in developed countries and WCO framework give some hints trade community in Korea which have not such a program. It is as follows.
 Firstly, it is necessary that the Customs-Trade Partnership program are developed and implemented in Korea.
 That program have to be included a validation process for Authorized Economic Operator. And it is necessary to offer incentives to AEO for voluntary cooperation to ensure the security of the international trade supply chain.
 Secondly, Korea Customs Service and Korea International Trade Association have to consider countermeasures against C-TPAT internationalization.
 That Customs-Trade Partnership program have to contribute an effective allocation of Customs resources, reduction of compliance cost, and strengthening of competitiveness of Trade community in Korea.Each customs administration have to establish a partnership with the private sector in order to ensure the safety and security of the international trade supply chain.

 And developed countries devised and implemented Customs-Trade Partnership program, i.e. C-TPAT in U.S., PIP in Canada, StairSec in Sweden.

 That Customs-Trade Partnership program have to contribute an effective allocation of Customs resources, reduction of compliance cost, and strengthening of competitiveness of Trade community in Korea.C-TPAT, StairSec, Partners in Protection(PIP)

제목: 무역을 통한 지식전파
초록: This paper estimate a patent equation to measure the effects of the trade on knowledge diffusion. We find the positive effects of trade and some preferential trade agreements like EU, EFTA and EEA on the international knowledge diffusion. Using a common language shows itself as another factor promoting the international knowledge diffusion. The effect of sharing common border is not robust. We find also that the patenting frequency is increased in proportion to the market size and the absorption capacity of the reporting country and the invention capacity of the country of residence of applicant. The estimation results show that the patenting to the member countries of international or regional patent cooperation agreements is more frequent than that to the other countries. We verify a trend of increasing of patent applications with recent strengthening of intellectual properties.Knowledge Diffusion, Trade, Patent Application

제목: 무역계약의 불이행 및 이행불능에 관한 비교법적 연구
초록:
There are innumerable kinds of types and terms of contracts which serve in the international trad incurring countless cases of nonfulfillment of contractual obliga- tions.
Whether termination of the contracts or claim for a Compensation for loss is to be resorted to, that is, whether requirement to justify such actions could be provided against the Party of the contract, shall be determined according to the nature of type and extent of contractual obligation such is mot fulfill. Thus, it bears signi- ficant importance on carrying out terms of contract that the contractual obligations not fulfilled are classify and studied according to type and effect of each of them.
It is intended by this study that, what is implied, in our existing law, by the term of nonfulfillment of contractual obligation, and what if meant, in the British and the U.S. law, by the term of "the breach of contract", and further, what is the difference between "nonfulfillment of contractual obligation" and "the breach of contract", shall be answered.
It is also within the scope of this study that, if any claim for compensation for loss incurred by the nonfulfillment of the contractual obligation or the breach of contract were to be placed, the proper extent to be covered by such compensation shall be established, and that how a contract is terminated due to frustration shall be examined and analyzed.There are innumerable kinds of types and terms of contracts which serve in the international trad incurring countless cases of nonfulfillment of contractual obliga- tions.

제목: 무역업의 리스크관리 사례 연구 - 한국과 일본 종합상사를 중심으로 -
초록:
This case study aims to analyze the developmental history of Enterprise Risk Management System (ERM) of trading companies in Korea and in Japan which is at present generally accepted as a best practice not only in international trading industry but also in all the industry in Korea.
 In nature, risk management area cannot provide many real cases to public, since risk basically means loss, damage, or catastrophe which companies concerned are not willing to share those information with public. However, risk experience or practice of a company can be substantially important information with which other companies can prevent same kinds of problem from occurring in them by reference.
 International trading is one of the most risky business among all the industry area due to logistical, institutional, cultural, language, time distance between transaction parties involved. That is, the trading is one of the most appropriate industry that needs to be focused with respect to risk experience and risk management. From this standpoint, this is highly valuable case study both in international trading area and in risk management area.
 Major Korean trading companies have suffered several times from fatal loss or damage. On the other hand, it also have overcame and survived the problems to develop the most innovative Enterprise Risk Management system in all the business area and companies in Korea. These experience and risk management system is worthwhile to be worked as a case study for trading business industry and for academic field in international trade.This case study aims to analyze the developmental history of Enterprise Risk Management System (ERM) of trading companies in Korea and in Japan which is at present generally accepted as a best practice not only in international trading industry but also in all the industry in Korea.

However, risk experience or practice of a company can be substantially important information with which other companies can prevent same kinds of problem from occurring in them by reference.

제목: 무역인력 역량의 기대 불일치에 관한 실증 연구
초록: This paper investigates competency problem of international trade human resources. It is well known that the discrepancy between the supply and demand of international trade human resources gets increasing over the time. Though existing the importance of international trade human resources research, not many researchers have been attempted to develop a model of representing the mismatching problem of them. In this regard, this paper suggests some hypotheses about the determinant factors that influence on the expectation disconfirmation of international trade human resources. The result shows that the expectation level of trading companies is bigger that the performance level in all competences based on the sample of 150 trading companies located in Seoul Metropolitan area. In addition, the result of hypotheses testing shows that the performance factor is more important than the expectation in influencing the disconfirmaton and satisfaction of them.International Trade, Human Resource Competence, Mismatch, Expectation And Performance Disconfirmation, Empirical Tests

제목: 貿易上 技術障壁으로서의 標準에 대한 中小企業의 認識과 標準化 政策 方向
초록:
Technical barriers in the trade liberalization debate refer to the elements of trade that hinder the free trade of goods and services by adapting and applying different standards, technical regulations, certification procedures, and inspection systems to other parties. Standard has dual meaning in the industrial view: first, it can increase the effectiveness of economic activities and preoccupy the market. This preoccupied standard, however, becomes obstacles for late players to overcome and barriers for the free trade system. 
 If so, what point of view do the Korean companies have about 'Standard and Technical Regulation' functioning as technical barriers? This study aimed to focus on Korean small and medium corporations, examining the extent of recognition on standard as trade barriers, whether they recognize standard as the measures for market preoccupation and what can enhance the recognition on standard.
 By literature research, this study covered the concepts and trends of technical barriers, while the concepts of standard and international standardization activities were examined. Then by surveying 151 Korean SMEs, the study empirically examined the recognition and utilization of standard as trade barriers, and the satisfaction level about the support system to increase such recognition. Finally, policy directions were made on how Korean SMEs can enhance the recognition on standard as trade barriers and the function as standard makers.Technical barriers in the trade liberalization debate refer to the elements of trade that hinder the free trade of goods and services by adapting and applying different standards, technical regulations, certification procedures, and inspection systems to other parties.
