Analytical results for the improvement of e-Trade service clearly indicate that the higher the impeding factor to utilization of the system integration, logistics and customs clearance, marketing and users field, the more necessary the service improvement for invigoration of e-Trade service. However, foreign exchange field does not seem to require attention because SMEs have not active will to do electronic payment through the process of electronic documents.e-Trade Service, uTradeHub, e-Trade

제목: 전자무역 활용과 성과에 관한 실증적 연구: 한국 수출입기업의 내·외부 환경요인을 중심으로
초록:
The purpose of this study is twofold: (1) to broaden this perspective by investigating the environmental, organizational drivers of business-to-business e-commerce adoption and implementation by korean export and import companies.
(2) to gain some insights about global paperless trade in korea. The basic research question is : What are the most important factors Affecting Global Paperless Trade Usage and its Performance in Korean Export-Import Company? The factors proposed for this study includes The pressure of trading companies, Industrial internal competition, Supported by a third party, top management support, formalization of organization We gathered detailed data on our sample companies mainly from publicly available sources : Korea Trade Network (KTNET). A structured questionnaire was used to collect information about: (1) the company (size, lines of business, products and services provided, employee, and some financial data about exporting), (2) To investigate the factors of the five contexts described above on korean export-import companies's global paperless trade. (3) Usage level of global paperless trade. and to get some information, We have to investigate. The factors proposed in the model were evaluated for reliability and factor analysis. The reliability or internal consistency was assessed by computing Cronbach's alpha. Factor analysis was also used to examine the convergent and discriminant validity of the constructs. A Principal Components Analysis with VARIMAX rotation. The multiple regression technique was applied to test the research hypotheses.
The analysis result revealed that the pressure of trading companies, Industrial internal competition, Supported by a third party, top management support are influential variables on the affecting global paperless trade in korean export-import companies.
The major contribution of this study is in the understanding what the environmental, technological and organizational drivers of electronic trade implementation are.Paperless Trading, pressure of trading companies, Industrial internal competition, Supported by a third party, top management support

제목: 국내 무역전시 연구 분류 및 동향에 관한 연구
초록:
This study aimed to analyze research trend of the trade show industry in Korea and further to suggest the future direction on the research area where industrial strategies and governmental supports can be made.
From 2001 to 2011 by order of 11-year study by analyzing research trends and future direction of policy more effective marketing strategy is precisely to provide direction for research.
For the purpose of this study, 169 articles from 49 national level journals of Korea was classified and analyzed. 30 researches in 2005 was published research papers related to the exhibition industry was grew rapidly.
According to the analysis, participants behavior of trade show were the most important topic with 33 articles.
Various statistical methods such as ANOVA, structural equation model, path analysis, t-test and regression were used. However the study methods of these researches didn't make much progress.
The result of this study indicated that we need to study more about the trade show industry of Korea, especially about local economic development and regional demand of trade show.Trade Show, Content Analysis, Research Trends

제목: 국제무역 및 제품에 내재된 탄소함유량 분석
초록:
이 논문에서는 국제무역 및 제품에 내재된 이산화탄소 배출량을 계산하기 위하여 환경 산업연관분석모형을 이용하였다. 분석결과, 첫째, 탄소 배출집약도 분석결과, 전력, 비금속, 철강, 비철금속, 항공수송, 육상/해상수송의 탄소배출 집약도가 높게 나타났다. 둘째, 우리나라는 호주/뉴질랜드, 아르헨티나, 브라질, 인도네시아, 일본, 러시아, 중동국가, 남아공, 중위소득국가 등과 교역할때 제품에 내재된 탄소를 수입하고, 캐나다, 프랑스, 독일, 인도, 이탈리아, 멕시코, 터키, 영국, 미국, 기타유럽 등과 교역 시 탄소를 제품에 내재화하여 수출하는 것으로 분석되었다. 셋째, 주요 국가별 환경수지를 분석한 결과, 중국, 러시아, 중동국가 등 개도국이 환경수지 흑자를 기록하는 반면 OECD 국가들은 환경수지 적자인 것으로 분석되었다. 이 논문은 소비측면의 탄소배출을 분석함으로써 국제무역에서 발생하는 환경수지를 파악할 수 있다.This paper aims to analyze the embodied carbon trade using MRIO(Multi-Regional Input-Output) model. A Multi-Regional Input-Output model has been chosen as the framework to be used for accounting CO2 emissions embodied in the commodity bundle.
The data base of the Global Trade Analysis Project (GTAP) was used to construct the MRIO model with full linkages.
The main results are as follows. Firstly, the embodied carbon is dispersed both across commodities and regions. Generally, chemicals, ferrous and non-ferrous metals and transportation services tend to be both energy and carbon intensive. Secondly, the most carbon-intensive commodities are electricity, metal and mineral products, transportation services and refined energy products. Thirdly, We decompose the embodied carbon of goods into direct and indirect factors. The electricity and transportation sectors are more carbon-intensive in production directly than indirect domestic and indirect imported.
Fourthly, the Korea exports more carbon in trade with Russia, Japan, China, India in iron and steel sector. Fifthly, the Korea exports more carbon in trade with developed countries,but imports more carbon in trade with developing countries. Finally, the United States,United Kingdom, Germany, and Japan import more carbon in trade with non-OECD states.Multi-Regional Input-Output Model, Global Trade Analysis Project, Embodied Carbon

제목: 국제무역에 함유된 부가가치와 수출보험
초록: 본 연구는 국제무역에 함유된 부가가치를 측정하는 투입-산출 모형을 설정하고 한국의 주요 무역대상국들에 대한 한국의 수출에 함유된 부가가치를 측정한 후 이것이 한국의 수출보험에 갖는 의미를 평가한다. 수출보험은 수출에 따른 다양한 위험을 제거시켜 수출을 증진시키는데 목적이 있으나 국내 본원적 생산요소의 고용과 소득 측면에서 수출액 자체보다도 그 수출액을 구성하는 부가가치의 비중이 훨씬 중요하다. 분석결과 미국을 제외한 북미와 아프리카가 수출보험 인수액 대비 부가가치가 상대적으로 높으며 중국과 일본을 제외한 아시아의 인수액 대비 부가가치가 낮은 것으로 평가된다. 수출보험을 통하여 수출을 촉진하되 되도록 수출단위당 부가가치가 상대적으로 많이 함유되는 지역 및 국가에 대한 수출을 증진시키는 것이 필요하다는 점이 강조된다.This paper concerns itself with the calculation of value added embodied in Korea’s international trade with trading partners and its implication on Korea’s export insurance policy. Two input-output models are presented to compute the value-added content of Korea’s foreign trade, the first one being rather simple model considering only value added embodied in direct exports to trading partners and the second one being a lot more complicated model incorporating value added in both direct and indirect exports and utilizing multi-regional input-output tables. The results show us the regional differences in value added per exports, reflecting the difference in the composition of exports. The relationship between insured exports and value added content of trade turns out to be not obvious and clear. However, it goes without saying that aggressive export insurance policy should be applied to the countries with similar national and commercial risks but high value added-insured export ratio.Value Added Content of Trade, Input-Output Model, Export Insurance

제목: 한중일 무역 및 전시산업 비교 연구
초록:
The purpose of this study is to analyze the current situation of trade and exhibition industry among Korea, China and Japan. For this purpose, this study analyzed as follows.
Firstly, this study comparatively analyzed the three countries' trade structures such as the merchandise trade size, mutual trade dependence, trade structure by commodity among Korea, China and Japan.
Secondly, this study comparatively analyzed the three countries' exhibition centers(facilities) such as the number of exhibition center, main exhibition centers, exhibition area of exhibition center in three countries.
Thirdly, this study comparatively analyzed the three countries' annual exhibitions(shows). we studied the number of exhibitions by city, the number of exhibitions by exhibition center, the number of exhibitions by industry in three countries.
Finally, after summarizing the overall content, this study presented the policy implications for upgrade of Korea exhibition industrytrade, trade structure, exhibition, show, exhibition industry, exhibition center, Korea, China, Japan

제목: CISG에서 무역관습 및 관행의 수용 범위에 관한 연구
초록:
국제무역환경은 제도, 문화, 그리고 관습 등에서 국내거래와는 차이가 많다. 복잡한 국제무역거래에 있어서 무역관습은 중요한 의미를 갖는다. 이에 따라 CISG 제9조에서 관습과 관행을 규정하고 있다. 본 규정을 중심으로 관습과 관행의 수용범위에 대해 살펴본다. 특히 사례분석을 통해 Incoterms 등이 무역관습의 범위에 포함될 수 있는가를 평가한다. 이를 통해 무역관습 수용의 문제점을 분석하고 실무상의 의미를 제시하고자 한다. 결론적으로 무역관습과 관행이 CISG에따라 당사자 간 거래를 구속할 수 있을지라도 입증의 문제 그리고 규정의 모호성 등으로 인하여실무당사자는 계약서에 계약내용을 명확히 작성해야 할 것이다.Trade usages develop spontaneously in the practice of international trade to governconcerned parties. CISG recognizes trade usage in international trade and itsprovisions includes trade usage and practice. This paper analyzes the incorporationscope of trade usage in CISG focused on the interpretations of CISG Article 9 andrelated cases. This paper shows several implications as follows;Firstly, CISG article 9 provides not only trade usages can only be applicable if partieshave agreed to them but also they are applicable if they represent a legal norm.
Secondly, international trade rules such as Incoterms and PICC, letter ofconformation, standard terms are recognized as trade usages under CISG article 9 invarious countries’ courts and international arbitration court.
However, there are some controversies in these decisions in practice ofinternational trade. That is to say, trade terms such as FOB, CIF etc in variouscountries do not always means to govern by Incoterms. on the other way, where theparty who carries the burden of proof does not succeed in proving it, the usages willnot be binding. In practice, where one party denies the existence of a usage whenthe usage is not favore to the party, it is difficult to prove the existence of the usagebecause vague basis under CISG article 9.
In conclusion, even though trade usages or practices are binding to trade partiesunder CISG article 9, it is not easy to judge the incorporation scope of them underCISG. Therefore, it is better trade parties to show clearly trade conditions in theircontract.Usage, Practice, CISG, Incoterms, PICC

제목: 전자무역금융의 전면 실시에 따른 이용현황과 개선방안
초록:
The Electronic Trade Finance not only has with the trait which is simple procedures, low cost but also easier access to using statistics compare to formerly paper based system. In Korea, all of trade finance system will be changed to electronic base by February 2014. The purpose of this research finds the using status and problems of the electronic local L/C and electronic purchase certificate, and suggests several improvements.
First, the whole trade finance system should improve in terms of simple procedures, especially small and medium companies can use the system sufficient maximum limit.
Second, the organizers, KTNET, KITA etc, need to the new electronic trade finance system promote to customers and training program for early settlement. It also has to manage at an unified system between IT and tex authorities.
Third, small and medium size companies still think the charge for using high, so it need to make a resonable charge for using the electronic system to persuasive extent reasonable about it.Electronic Trade Finance, Electronic Local L/C, Electronic Purchase Certificate, Trade Finance, Local L/C, Purchase Certificate

제목: 전자무역 마케팅의 변화와 발전 방안에 관한 연구
초록:
e-Trade 3.0 era which means the expansion of seamless e-Trade processinto global business has been come. e-Trade is in the evolution stage withthe reflection of time changes and IT development. Furthermore e-Trademarketing method of SMEs has been generalized.
However, SMEs have not utilized e-Trade marketing very actively even ifit has much benefits in exploring overseas marketing. In this regard thispaper has cautiously suggested the strategic using plan of e-Marketplace andSNS along with policy improvement in order to promote extensive diffusionof e-Trade marketing.
First of all, a comprehensive evaluation system has to be developed for theassessment of overseas marketing program and provide organized guidelineincluding SMEs support system.
Also e-Marketplace operation company is necessary to invent managementsystem for supervising and detecting risk factors of participating firms andbusiness model to share information which each e-Marketplace possessesthrough mutual connection.
Finally, the effective supports such as short-term education and actingoperation of initial account to use SNS strategically are needed andcontinuous contents development to adopt SNS is absolute.전자무역, 전자거래알선사이트, SNS 마케팅

제목: 중국과의 무역거래에서 UCP 600 적용상의 문제점에 관한 연구
초록:
This paper intends to study some problems in the application of UCP 600 in the international trade transactions with China. Generally speaking, China complies with UCP 600 well. Nevertheless, there are some problems in the application of UCP 600 in China owing to the difference in law and practices.
There are some problems in the application of UCP 600 in China owing to the difference of practices under Bills of Exchange Act and The Provisions of the Supreme People’s Court on Some Issues Concerning the Trial of Cases of Disputes over Letter of Credit. The Act insists on the formal requirements, the consistency between a letter amount and a figure amount, the unconditional payment character of bills of exchange. The Provisions include the recognition of revocable credits, the difference of standard in examining documents, the difference in the treatment of issuing banks in relation to discrepant documents. These aforesaid matters of the Act and the Provisions are inconsistent with the practices under the UCP 600.
There are two main problems in the operation of letters of credit in China. One is the lack of concerned parties’ practice knowledge in relation to letters of credit in China. The other is the inactive stance of nominated banks in China.
There are two main problems in relation to judiciary institutions in China. First, judges in China tend to abuse the injunctions owing to the lack of understanding in relation to letters of credit. Secondly, there are inconsistency in the court ruling in China.UCP 600, Letter of Credit, L/C, China

제목: 중국 《무역백서(中国的对外贸易)》의 주요내용 및 한국기업의 대응책
초록:
During the past decade after entering the World Trade Organization (WTO), China has quickened its integration into the global economy while its foreign trade has been further invigorated. On the 10th anniversary of China's accession to the WTO, the Chinese government issues White Paper to give a comprehensive introduction to China's foreign trade development.
Through this paper, the Chinese government introduces I. Historic Progress in China's Foreign Trade II. Reform of and Improvements to China's Foreign Trade System III. The Development of China's Foreign Trade Contributes to the World Economy IV. Promoting Basically Balanced Growth of Foreign Trade V. Constructing All-round Economic and Trade Partnerships with Mutually Beneficial Cooperation VI. Realizing Sustainable Development of Foreign Trade.
At present, the underlying impact of the international financial crisis, the protracted, arduous and complicated nature of the world economic recovery is manifesting itself, and the global economic structure and trade layout face in-depth readjustment. China will make new adjustments to its foreign trade, in an effort to turn foreign trade from scale expansion to quality and profit improvement, and from mainly relying on its low-cost advantage to enhancing its comprehensive competitive edge, thereby turning China from a big trading country to a strong trading power.
China's foreign trade is still hampered by many uncertainties and is bound to meet new difficulties and challenges. During the 12th Five-year Plan period China will open itself wider to the outside world as a driver for further reform, development and innovation, make full use of its advantages, strengthen international cooperation in all respects. And at the same time China integrate itself into the world economy on a wider scale and at a higher level. China is willing to work with its trading partners to cope with the various challenges facing the world economy and trade, and promote its foreign trade to realize a more balanced, coordinated and sustainable development, and share prosperity and mutually beneficial results with its trading partners.China, WTO, Trade History, Current Trade, Trade Policy

제목: 대외무역법 행정규칙의 개편방향에 관한 연구
초록:
There are over 20 administrative rules related to Korea Foreign Trade Act including Export and Import Notification, Consolidated Notification, Notification for Strategic Materials and so on. The purpose of this research proposes to reform some administrative rules related to Korea Foreign Trade Act.
First, the administrative rules are a little many and hidden in part, so the effort need for simplification and publication. Especially Export and Import Notification is no need more, and some articles can be transfer to the similar notification.
Second, the prohibited or regulated items are only 135, and the reason is cooperation to world trade policy and Korea trade purpose. The item number of trade limitation are decreased sharply compare to several decades, but we still effort to decrease.
Third, There are 2 tracks trade regulation both Korea Foreign Trade Act and 57 specific acts. The number of trade limitation item is over 5,000, so it is impossible to control by Consolidated Notification. The role of Consolidated Notification is the just guides for Export and Import, so trader has to use the specific trade-related law.Korea Foreign Trade Act, Administrative Rule, Export and Import Notification, Consolidated Notification

제목: 대중국 무역에서 우리나라 항만의 집중에 관한 연구
초록: 한국과 중국은 2014년 11월 10일에 한중자유무역협정(FTA)을 사실상 타결하였다고 선언하였다. 한중FTA가 체결되면 양국간의 항만을 통한 무역량이 급증할 것으로 예상된다. 특히 지리적으로 가까운 서해안의 항만에서 중국과의 교역이 크게 늘어날 것으로 전망되고 있다. 이러한 예상에도 불구하고 실제 중국과의 교역에 있어서 어떠한 항만에 집중되고 있는 지는 향후 항만의 운영계획 수립에 있어서 중요한 사항이다. 따라서 본 연구에서는 중국과의 교역에 따른 우리나라 항만의 집중을 밝혀내기 위하여 허쉬만-허핀달지수와 사회연결망분석을 이용하였다. 분석결과 대중국 무역에서 항만 집중은 지속적으로 부산항에 집중되고 있지만 집중도는 낮아지고 있다.Korea's largest trading partner is China. Sooner or later, Korea and China will sign a Korea-China FTA(free trade agreement). A Korea-China FTA will be concluded when the trade volume is expected to rise over the harbor between the two countries. Especially those geographically close to the West Sea coastal ports are expected to significantly increase trade with China. Despite these expectations it is important to establish an operating plan for these such ports and those of China. This study focuses only on determining the concentration of national ports within Korea and China. The analysis used is by the Hirschman-Herfindahl Index(HHI) and social network analysis. Analysis of trade between China reveals that trade continues to be concentrated on the Busan Port, though the overall concentration of port traffic is becoming less.concentration, social network analysis, Hirschman-Herfindahl Index, port traffic

제목: 국제무역거래상 권리포기 선하증권과 관련된 해상화물보험의 대위청구권에 관한 연구
초록:
The insurer’s right to take legal proceedings in the name of the assured against a third party who has caused loss of or damage to the goods is of particular importance in marine cargo insurance under international trade transaction. The amounts recovered in subrogation actions, known in practice simply as recoveries, form a significant element in the balancing of the cargo insurer’s underwriting account by improving ing the loss record. However, even if the carrier involved in the accident have a liability for damages, in some cases can not claim damages in accordance with the after clauses and carrier’s exemption clauses indemnity carrier under the contract of carriage.
In recent, the dispute cases to argue damages claim of the carrier in connection with business practices of surrender B/L, the claim is dismissed cases in accordance with the Arbitration Rules of the after clauses.
In the future, the surrender B/L is continually to use as a marine transport method, it may also be interested in insurance subrogation of damages claims to insurance accident by a surrender B/L.International Trade Transaction, Surrender B/L, Marine Cargo Insurance, Insurance Subrogation Claim

제목: 국내 무역 및 물류 관련 학술지의 중요도 평가에 관한 연구
초록:
우수한 학술지에 논문을 게재하는 것은 연구자의 승진과 업적, 학자로서의 명성 그리고 연구자가 무역 및 물류 학계에 학문적인 기여를 하는데 중요한 영향을 미친다. 따라서 무역 및 물류 관련 학술지의 가치를 평가하고 중요도와 명성을 측정하기 위해 본 연구는 이 분야의 연구자들을 대상으로 설문조사를 실시하였다. 이러한 학술지의 평가 결과는 국내 연구자들이 논문을 게재하고자 하는 경우 선호하는 학술지의 순위를 보여줄 뿐 아니라, 연구자들이 속한 기관에서 업적을 평가받는 경우 참고할 수 있는 또 하나의 기준을 제시하고 있다.
본 연구 결과는 무역 및 물류 분야 학술지의 전반적인 중요도를 보여주는 동시에 관련 분야 학술지의 순위와 연구자의 연구 주제별 선호 학술지를 제시함으로써 논문 투고 시 학술지 선택에 도움을 주고자 하였다.It is well accepted that qualitative evaluation of scholarly journals plays an important role in promotion and tenure decisions, recognition, scholarly discussion and the contribution to the knowledge in international trade and logistics and every other scholarly fields alike. In order to identify the universe of journal publication outlets for international trade and logistics research and to observe the value of the outlets to international trade and logistics researchers, this study employs a survey instrument. For assisting logistics and trade faculty and administrators in these assessment, the latest perceptions among trade and logistics faculty regarding the relative hierarchical positioning of scholarly trade and logistics journals are reviewed. Besides the overall ranking, the study classifies journals into two levels: rankings for allied discipline research journals and rankings by various research subjects. The results found by this study can be used by various international trade and logistics faculty constituencies in evaluating publication importance via their selected reference groups.Assessing journals, Rankings of journals, Popularity/familiarity index, Importance/prestige index, Selecting publication outlet

제목: 서비스무역 커리큘럼 개발에 관한 연구
초록:
The importance of trade in services has been increasing day by day, but the research on it is insufficient so far in terms of basic information, statistics, influence, industrialization and so on. To foster of professional trader in services,we need curriculums, textbooks and training centers like academy or college in advance. We have well developed curriculums for trade in goods since 1960’s inKorea, sowe can transfer the trade in goods’ curriculumto trade in services. There are some differences between trade in goods and trade in services basically, but we can borrowa lot of idea fromtrade in goods in terms of basic framework like international economics, international business and international commercial transactions.
This study propose the basic framework for trade in services’ curriculum. First, trade in services economics handle the basic concept, statistics, characteristics, theories etc. Second, trade in services business treat the global companies to expandtheir business to globalmarket, so characteristics of service companies, marketing plan and strategies and so on. Third, international commercial transaction of trade in services concentrate for procedures and contracts in terms of formation, implementation and finish of contract. Finally, Services industries can be a future strategic industry to any contries, so there are some national and corporates’ strategy for expanding their business.
This study acts on the initial idea for curriculums of trade in services, so I am looking forward to many criticism and development from another researchers to develop the model curriculums and textbook for education of specialized trader in services.Trade in Services, Curriculumof Trade in Services, Text of Trade in Services

제목: 국제무역상 장래금전채권의 양도에 관한 연구
초록:
최근 무역과 금융환경 변화로 인하여 장래채권의 국제적 양도와 같은 채권의 국제적 양도가 중요성이 더해지고 있는 상황이나, 우리나라에서는 아직도 채권관련 제도의 미비 및 보완할 점 등이 많은 관계로 활성화되지 않은 상황이다. 이러한 상황 속에서 이를 극복하기 위한 장래채권의 양도에 관한 제도적 개선방안 모색하고자 한다. 이에 앞서 우리나라 민법상 장래금전채권의 양도에 관한 개괄적인 고찰을 함으로써 현재 적용되는 제도상의 전반적인 개괄과 장단점을 알아보고, 장래채권의 양도에 관한 독일・일본 등의 제도를 비교분석하고자 한다. 또한 국제규범인 국제채권양도협약 및 국제상사계약원칙(PICC) 등의 제도를 함께 비교분석하여, 장래채권의 양도에 관한 제도적 한계를 검토하고 이를 극복할 수 있는 개선방안 등을 제시하고자 한다.Among various export financing, Assignment of Future Monetary Rights is very important. Various countries make use of this method. But Korean law system have shortage of nature on legal system.
This paper looks into Assignment of Future Rights relation to legal system. And this paper analyze not only detail Korean civil law system about Assignment of Rights and Future Rights but also comparative other civil law system. Especially, Korean civil law system of Future Rights compare Germany civil law system of Future Rights or Japanese civil law system of Future Rights.
In the context, This paper compares Korean civil law system about Assignment of Rights with International standard rule about Assignment of Rights. For example, It is UN convention on the Assignment of Receivables in International Trade and Principles of International Commercial Contract(PICC).
This is good for the commercial party in terms of financing and receivable assignment.
Thus this paper will establish Korean legal system direction. There are argument on method of making article and amending article.
The purposes of this paper is to examine revitalizing on Assignment of Future Rights. And this paper deals with improvement of International Commercial Activation.Future Monetary Rights, Assignment of Future Rights, Transferability of Receivable Assignment, International Assignment of Future Rights

제목: 공정무역의 한계와 그 원인에 대한 연구
초록:
Recently, world wide trading which support free trade will increase the economic volume size. It will grow the quality of life. But, the reduce of gap between the rich state and the poor one has always been risen the problem of one of welfare.
　Trough unregulated trade activities, multinational corporations succeeded in expanding the market globally. However, there were unfair acts such as infringement of serious rights of producer of low development countries.
　Fair trade has begun to pay fair value to them and to ease inequality, but, as time went by, the its idea became thinner, distorted in the market, or became a marketing tools.
　So, In this paper, I analyze the limitations and causes of fair trade and suggest directions for fair trade.
　This Study provided a causes of the limitation of fair trade and for the future, I’ll suggest an alternative of limitation of fair trade.Fair Trading, Multinational Company, The Limits of Fair Trading

제목: 국제무역상 채권양도의 통지 및 승낙에 관한 일고찰 - 한국민법의 개선방안을 제시하며 -
초록:
최근 무역과 금융환경 변화로 인하여 채권의 국제적 양도와 같은 채권의 국제적 양도가 중요성이 더해지고 있는 상황이나, 우리나라에서는 아직도 채권관련 제도의 미비 및 보완할 점 등이 많은 관계로 활성화되지 않은 상황이다. 이러한 상황 속에서 이를 극복하기 위한 채권양도의 통지 및 승낙에 관한 제도적 개선방안 모색하고자 한다. 이에 앞서 우리나라 민법상 채권양도의 통지 및 승낙에 관한 개괄적인 고찰을 함으로써 현재 적용되는 제도상의 전반적인 개괄과 장단점을 알아보고, 채권양도의 통지 및 승낙에 관한 국제상사계약원칙(PICC)과 국제채권양도협약 등의 제도를 고찰하고자 한다. 또한 국제규범인 국제상사계약원칙(PICC) 및 국제채권양도협약 등의 제도적 차이점을 비교분석하여, 채권양도의 통지 및 승낙에 관한 제도적 한계를 검토하고 이를 극복할 수 있는 개선방안 등을 제시하고자 한다.Among various export financing, Assignment of Receivables is very important. Various countries make use of this method. But Korean law system have shortage of International legal system.
This paper looks into Notification and Acceptance on Assignment of Receivables relation to legal system. And this paper analyze not only detail Korean civil law system about Notification and Acceptance on Assignment of Receivables but also comparative other International system. There are UNIDROIT Principles and United Nations Convention on the Assignment of Receivables in International Trade. Especially, Korean civil law system of Notification and Acceptance on Assignment of Receivables compare UNIDROIT Principles system of Notification and Acceptance on Assignment of Receivables or United Nations Convention on the Assignment of Receivables in International Trade of Notification and Acceptance on Assignment of Receivables.
In the context, This paper compares Korean civil law system about Assignment of Receivables with International standard rule about Assignment of Receivables. This is good for the commercial practice party in terms of financing and receivable assignment.
Thus this paper will make direction to Korean Law Operating Practicer. There are argument on method of having a action or manual about Law system.
The purposes of this paper is to examine revitalizing on Assignment of Receivables. And this paper deals with improvement of International Commercial Activation.Assignment of Receivables, UNIDROIT Principles, Notification and Acceptance against Assignment of Receivables, United Nations Convention on the Assignment of Receivablesin International Trade

제목: 국제무역상 채권의 상계에 관한 비교연구 - 한국민법의 개선방안을 제시하며 -
초록:
최근 국제무역과 무역결제의 변화로 인하여 채권이 국제적으로 사용되고 있으며 그 중요성이 더해지고 있는 상황이다. 그러나 현재 우리나라는 아직도 채권관련 제도가 미비할 뿐만 아니라 보완할 점이 많은 실정이다. 따라서 이러한 상황 속에서 이를 극복하기 위한 채권의 상계에 관한 제도적 개선점에 대하여 고찰하고자 한다. 이에 앞서 우리나라 민법상 채권의 상계에 관한 개괄적인 고찰을 함으로써 현재 적용되는 제도상의 전반적인 내용과 장단점을 살펴보고, 채권의 상계에 관한 국제규범인 국제상사계약원칙(PICC)과의 비교를 통하여 고찰하고자 한다. 또한 국제규범인 국제채권양도협약 등 제도적 비교를 함으로써, 채권의 상계에 관한 국내법상 제도적 미비점을 검토함으로써 이를 개선할 수 있는 방안 등을 제시하고자 한다.Among various export financing, Receivables is very important. Various countries make use of this method. But Korean system have shortage of International legal system.
This paper looks into Set-off against Receivables relation to legal system. And this paper analyze not only Korean civil law system about Set-off against Receivables but also other International system. There are UNIDROIT Principles and United Nations Convention on the Assignment of Receivables in International Trade. Especially, Korean civil law system of Set-off against Receivables compares UNIDROIT Principles system of Set-off against Receivables or United Nations Convention on the Assignment of Receivables in International Trade of Set-off against Receivables.
In the context, This paper compares Korean civil law system about Set-off against Receivables with International standard rule about Set-off against Receivables. This is good for the commercial practice party in terms of financing and receivable.
Thus this paper will make direction to Korean Law Operating Practicer. There are argument on method of having a action or manual about Law system.
The purposes of this paper is to examine revitalizing on Rule of Receivables. And this paper deals with improvement of International Commercial Activation.Assignment of Receivables, Set-off against Receivables, United Nations Convention on the Assignment of Receivablesin International Trade, UNIDROIT Principles

제목: 새로운 무역 대금 결제방식(TSU/BPO)의 등장에 따른 결제방식의 선택에 관한 연구
초록:
국제 무역거래에서 결제방식으로는 송금방식, 신용장방식, 추심방식이 주로 사용되고 있다. 과거에는 신용장방식의 비중이 가장 높았으나 최근에는 송금방식의 비중이 약 70%에 달할 정도로 절대적인 비중을 차지하고 있다. 그런데 송금방식은 결제시기에 따라서 한 당사자는 유리하지만 다른 당사자는 불리하다는 문제점이 있다. 이러한 송금방식의 문제점 때문에 2007년 전자무역 결제 서비스(TSU), 2009년 은행지급확약(BPO)이 새롭게 등장하여 새로운 결제수단으로서 최근 그 사용이 증가하고 있다.
TSU/BPO 방식은 수출상 측면에서는 무역대금의 조기 회수, 선적서류 작성 부담의 경감, 불일치 대응 부담으로부터의 해방, 수입상의 취소ㆍ조건변경의 감소라는 장점이 있다. 또한 수입상 측면에서는 결제의 조기화에 따르는 외상매입대금 관리 부담 경감, 신속한 거래의 실현, 수출기업에 대한 유리한 거래교섭, 무역 전문인재 채용부담의 경감이라는 장점이 있다. 이에 본고는 최근 이용이 증가하고 있는 TSU/BPO 이용의 거래 당사자별 장점을 설명하고, 향후 결제방식의 선택에 있어서 송금방식, 신용장방식, TSU/BPO 방식의 선택적 사용을 제안한다.This work intends to study the selection of payment methods in compliance with the advent of new payment method(TSU/BPO). T/T and L/C have been widely used as traditional payment methods in international trade. TSU/BPO has appeared as a new payment method recently. It has been introduced as a new alternative payment method based on a technology and data-driven mechanism aimed at facilitating an electronic trading in international trade transactions.
TSU/BPO is an irrevocable undertaking given by an obligor bank acting on behalf of a buyer to a recipient bank acting on behalf of a seller to pay a specific amount under the condition of a successful electronic matching of data. It enables the participating banks to provide sellers and buyers with enhanced financing services. It replaces the manual document checking process with the electronic matching of data. So, both exporters and importers will benefit from increased accuracy and objectivity. TSU/BPO will lower costs, speed up transaction process and strengthen key customer relationships.
Sellers and buyers have three payment options such as T/T, L/C and TSU/BPO. They can choose an appropriate payment method for their trade transactions. Since TSU/BPO has many aforesaid advantages compared to T/T and L/C, it will be widely used in international trade in the near future.L/C, Letter of Credit, TSU/BPO, T/T

제목: 자유무역협정 시대 농산업화 사례 연구: 키위 계약생산 사례를 중심으로
초록: 이 글은 FTA 활용이 우리 농산업화에 갖는 의미를 살피고, 농업분야 FTA 활용 확대를 위한정책적 시사점을 찾는 것을 목적으로 한다. 이 연구는 농산업화의 핵심인 농기업과 지역농가 간의 계약생산의 실 사례를 살피는 사례연구로서 학문적으로는 FTA 활용에 대한 논의를 농산업화연구까지 확장하는 의의가 있고, 실천적으로는 우리 농업분야 과제에 대한 근본적인 해법을 제시하고 FTA 활용 확대를 위한 정책적 시사점을 찾는 의의가 있다. 연구결과를 통해 FTA로 인해유발된 경쟁 속에서 농산업화가 진전을 이루기 위해 농기업과 농가 간 평등하고 공정한 관계 형성을 위한 정부의 지속적인 조정과 지원이 필수적임을 강조한다.The purpose of this paper is to investigate the roles and effects of FTAs (Free Trade Agreements) in agroindustrialization, and to navigate its implication for the government support for the utilization of FTAs in the agriculture sector. The paper, in particular, is based on a case of contract farming, which has often referred as the key factor of agroindustrialization. By doing this, this paper has the importance academically in enhancing the study of FTA utilization to the study of agroindustrialization, and practically in exploring the implication for the FTA implementation policy that provides fundamental solutions to the issues of agriculture sector. As the results of this study, it is highlighted that the role of government that intermediates, monitors, and controls the equal and the fair relationship between the agribusiness firms and farms is essential for the further progress of agroindustrialization under the keen competition created by FTAs.Free Trade Agreement, Agroindustrialization, Contract Farming, FTA Utilization

제목: 전자상거래 무역상 창업의도 결정요인
저자: 응엔 티 비엣 하 /Nguyen Thi Viet Ha
초록:
There is a growing interest on entrepreneurship for undergraduate students to enhance their employment ratio because they have big difficulty in getting a job in Korea as well as Vietnam. Currently, on-line business is booming because customers feel convenience in approaching on-line store. Therefore, this study has explored identifying the factors to affect entrepreneurial intention of being e-commerce trader for the undergraduates in Korean universities as well as Vietnam universities. In addition to this, the study has also investigated the difference of the results between Korea and Vietnam.
　The results of the study are as follows ; 　First, entrepreneurial knowledge affects positively on entrepreneurial intention for being e-commerce trader. Second, employment barrier also affects positively on entrepreneurial intention for being e-commerce trader.
　Third, social perception on entrepreneurship mediates the relationship between employment barrier and entrepreneurial intention for being e-commerce trader.
　Lastly, the level of entrepreneurial intention for vietnam undergraduate students shows higher than that of Korean undergraduate students.
　Since there was lack of recognition as to the importance for entrepreneurial intention of being e-commerce trader in Korea, Korean government can refer to the results of this survey and implement the related policies to enhance related entrepreneurial intention. This indicates that when it comes to the establishment of new ventures in Korea, entrepreneurial education has been the focus of interest such as making business plan, setting up strategy, marketing the products etc. In this regard, this research is expected to be used for the development for the future policies to boost youth entrepreneurship in Korea.Entrepreneurial Intention for E-commerce trader, Social Perception on Entrepreneurship, Employment Barrier, Entrepreneurship

제목: 국제무역거래에서 은행지급확약(BPO)의 활발한 사용을 위한 과제
초록:
국제간의 무역결제에서 중요한 양대 기구인 세계은행간 금융전신망(SWIFT)과 국제상업회의소(ICC)의 적극적인 협조로 국제무역에서의 새로운 결제수단으로서 은행지급확약(BPO)이 출현하였다. 출현 당시 BPO는 송금방식의 신속성과 신용장방식의 은행의 지급보장과 파이낸스 기능의 장점이 결합되어 기존의 송금방식과 신용장방식을 대체할 것이라는 큰 기대를 받았다.
그런데 최근에 들어와서 BPO의 사용이 정체된 상황을 맞고 있다. 이는 BPO 취급은행이 부족하다는 점과 공급망 관리의 연결이 부족하다는 점이 문제로 지적된다. 또한 수출상이 은행을 경유하지 않고 직접 수입상에게 서류를 전달하는 위험과 은행 입장에서 선하증권이라는 담보가 없다는 위험이 있다.
BPO는 송금방식과 신용장방식의 장점을 가지고 있으며, 앞으로 BPO 취급은행이 확대되고 BPO 서비스의 질이 향상된다면 송금방식과 신용장방식을 잇는 제3의 결제방식이 될 것으로 기대된다.This work intends to study the challenges for active use of Bank Payment Obligation(BPO) in international trade transactions. The active cooperation between the Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommu- nication (SWIFT) and the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC) has led to the emergence of Bank Payment Obligation(BPO) as a new payment instrument in international trade. At the time of the emergence, it was expected that it would replace the existing remittance method and the letter of credit by combining the promptness of the remittance method and the advantage of the credit function and the financial function of the bank.
However, recently, the use of BPO has become stagnant. This is pointed out as the lack of a BPO handling bank and lack of connection to supply chain management. There is also the risk that the exporter will not be able to deliver the documents directly to the importer without going through the bank and the collateral as a bill of lading in the case of the bank.
BPO has advantages of remittance method and letter of credit method, and it is expected that it will be the third payment method connecting the remittance method and the letter of credit method by expanding the BPO handling bank and improving the quality of the BPO service.BPO, L/C, Letter of Credit, T/T

제목: 국제무역 거래시 스마트 계약과 디지털 조세의 연계 방안에 대한 연구
초록:
오늘날 정보통신기술(ICT)의 영향으로 국제무역도 거래 및 결제 그리고 관세 및 디지털조세에 있어서 시스템 및 공정의 혁신과 발전이 이루어지고 있으며 안정적이고 효율적인 플랫폼 구축으로 전 세계가 하나의 수출입 공동체로 인식되고 있다.
본 연구에서 살펴본 결과, 블록체인의 도입으로 무역거래의 신속한 절차 및 무역서류의 보안성을 강화할 수 있고, 신용장 개설 및 통지와 수출 통관 및 운송 단계에서 공급망의 가시성이 증가하며 전반적인 무역 프로세스의 스마트화로 거래 위험을 상당히 줄일 수 있었다. 또한 인터넷 플랫폼을 기반으로 한 무역 결제 시스템과 관련하여 법정화폐뿐만 아니라 디지털화폐, 가상화폐, 암호화폐의 특징을 통해 무역보험과 환어음 관리에도 많은 변화가 있을 것으로 예상된다. 이와 더불어 스마트계약 플랫폼에서 파생될 수 있는 디지털조세와 관련하여 소비지국과세원칙에 따른 수출재화와 재화의 수입 및 공급시기 문제와 ICT 기반의 거래가 용역 거래로 간주될 경우 B2B와 B2C의 전자적 용역에 대한 납세지역 문제 그리고 내국세와 관세의 신고 및 납부시기와 부과될 세목 등에 대해서도 살펴보았다.
본 논문의 한계점으로는 다음과 같다.
첫째, 스마트계약에 암호화폐와 블록체인 기술이 적용될 경우 법적 규제 방안이 마련되어야 한다.
둘째, 결제 기능으로써 디지털화된 화폐가 사용될 경우 다양한 수익모델, 수요자 중심의 금융상품 개발, 핀테크와의 연계 방안이 필요하다.
셋째, 금융 ICT 인프라의 안정적인 구축과 국제 무역시스템과의 연계 방안이 요구된다.
넷쩨, 디지털조세의 부과 근거 및 범위에 대한 관세법과 내국세법의 규정이 필요하며 조세의 공평성 측면에서 국제법과의 연계가 필요해 보인다.The impact of information and communications technology has led to the innovation and development of systems and processes in international trade, specifically on trade settlement, customs, and digital service tax. In accordance with such trend, the world is recognized as a single import and export community through the establishment of a stable and efficient platform.
According to the results of the study, the introduction of block chain was able to accelerate the procedures of trade transaction and enhance the security of trade documents while increasing the visibility of supply chain in the stages of opening and issuing notification of the L/C, export customs clearance, and transportation. Also, it can greatly reduce transaction risk through smartification of the overall trade process. In relation to the trade settlement system based on the internet platform, it is also expected to bring many changes in the management of trade insurance and B/L by using the characteristics of digital currency, virtual currency, and crypto currency, as well as fiat currency. Regarding digital service tax that can be derived from smart contract platforms, the following issues were examined: export and import of goods and timing of supply of goods in accordance with destination principle of taxation; place for tax payment of electronic services of B2B and B2C when ICT-based transactions are considered as a service transaction; and the submission of report and payment time of domestic tax and customs duties and the other duties to be imposed.Smart Contract, Digital Service Tax, Block Chain, Digitalized Currency, Fintech, Customs Law

제목: 국제무역거래에서 Escrow 결제방식의 활성화 방안에 대한 연구
초록:
국경간 전자상거래가 성장하면서 국내 전자상거래에서 사용하고 있는 에스크로 결제방식도 무역거래에서 결제방식으로 사용되려고 하고 있으나 아직까지 기존의 결제수단들과 비교해서 활용도는 낮은 편이다.
이는 에스크로를 무역결제수단으로 사용할 경우 수입상의 결제대금의 예치에 따른 자금조달부담감, 수입상의 물품 확인 후의 결제에 따른 신용위험 및 반송위험의 증가, 타 결제수단에 비해 저렴하지 않은 수수료 등이 원인이 된다.
본 논문에서는 이러한 문제점들을 해결하는 방안으로 에스크로에 신용장 및 BPO의 개념을 결합한 결제방식을 제안하였다.With the development of e-commerce, each country has become to favor the escrow payment method as a safe payment method. Also for trades, as cross-border e-commerce develops, there has been a movement to use escrow as a trade settlement method, but the usage of it is still insignificant compared to the existing trade settlement methods.
In this paper, I analyze the reasons why the escrow payment method is not becoming active in trade transactions.
In terms of the timing of importers’ financing, escrow has a disadvantage compared to conventional payment method as it requires depositing money to start a transaction. In addition, although it is a big advantage for the importers that they can confirm the goods and instruct the payment, in contrary, from the standpoint of the exporter, there is great anxiety because they cannot rule out the possibility of the importer’s intentional flaw claiming. Also, there are more restrictions on trade transaction than on domestic transactions in reselling returned goods if products are returned, therefore, the risk of returned goods is inevitable for exporters.
In the case of escrow companies, if a non-financial company provides escrow services, there is also a problem that small escrow companies cannot take a sufficient remedy action in case of an accident. Also, from the viewpoint of importers and exporters, the lack of international rules governing the payment method of escrow can cause anxiety to the parties to the transaction as they can only be protected by the terms and conditions of the transaction agreement with the escrow company.
The inability of exporters to recover funds in early stage through purchases such as letters of credit or collection can also be an obstacle to the spread.
In addition, the recent fraud issues that abused the escrow can make the use of escrow insecure.
Above all, the fact that the for using escrow is not cheaper than the existing payment method is a big factor that hinders the spread.
There may be no way to solve this problem at once, but the writer suggests a method to reduce the credit risk and return risk in exports by receiving payment after determining whether the shipping document data matches or not through and automatic system like the escrow company’s secured credit and BPO, as a way to solve the importer’s problems of timing of financing and payment after inspection of the goods.
In the future, the use of escrow will increase as the number of cross-border e-commerce increases. If the problems analyzed in this paper are solved, the escrow payment method will be more active in trade transactions.Escrow, Telegraphic Transfer, Open Account, Collection, Letter of Credit, BPO, Credit Risk, Commercial Risk

제목: 오프라인과 온라인 무역결제의 부대비용에 관한 비교 연구
초록:
This study has examined one of the reasons why trade communities are not willing to convert from traditional trade to utilization of e-trade ever though th latter has more advantage than the former in order to vitalize the electronic trade settlement method. In particular, it has compared incidental expense between off-line and on-line for the trade settlement.
 For the effective analysis, the incidental expenses have been classified into three sectors such as fixed expense, variable expense, additional expense. Also this paper analyzed a difference of the incidental expense by purchase amount like US$10,000, US$20,000, US$30,000. Meanwhile, it has tried to find the cross point of incidental expense between the traditional and electronic trade settlement with additional expense and without additional expense respectively.
 In the case of trade settlement without additional expense, the cross point is less than US$15,000. This implied that the use of L/C method be more attractive than one of Trade Card system when the purchase amount will be above US$15,000. However, in case of trade settlement with additional expense, the cross point is more than US$30,000 at sight payment and US$27,500 at usance payment respectively.
 In conclusion, this paper shows a reasonable level of purchase amount using the electronic settlement. Also the level of the cross point depends on whether a transaction contains additional expense or not. IT means that the seller are going to use the traditional settlement if there is no possibility of payment risks. Otherwise, the seller wants to use the electronic settlement method.This study has examined one of the reasons why trade communities are not willing to convert from traditional trade to utilization of e-trade ever though th latter has more advantage than the former in order to vitalize the electronic trade settlement method. In particular, it has compared incidental expense between off-line and on-line for the trade settlement.
 For the effective analysis, the incidental expenses have been classified into three sectors such as fixed expense, variable expense, additional expense. Also this paper analyzed a difference of the incidental expense by purchase amount like US$10,000, US$20,000, US$30,000. Meanwhile, it has tried to find the cross point of incidental expense between the traditional and electronic trade settlement with additional expense and without additional expense respectively.
 In the case of trade settlement without additional expense, the cross point is less than US$15,000. This implied that the use of L/C method be more attractive than one of Trade Card system when the purchase amount will be above US$15,000. However, in case of trade settlement with additional expense, the cross point is more than US$30,000 at sight payment and US$27,500 at usance payment respectively.
 In conclusion, this paper shows a reasonable level of purchase amount using the electronic settlement. Also the level of the cross point depends on whether a transaction contains additional expense or not. IT means that the seller are going to use the traditional settlement if there is no possibility of payment risks. Otherwise, the seller wants to use the electronic settlement method.Trade Settlement, Electronic Trade Settlement, Incidental expense, Settlement expense, Trade Card, Bolero

제목: WTO의 무역원활화 GATT X조 투명성 논의와 정책적 함의
초록: As tariffs have fallen, various non-tariff barriers have gained importance as trade barriers. WTO, along with other international organizations is seeking to reduce these non-tariff barriers. Such efforts are often referred to as “trade facilitation.” In August 2005, trade facilitation has become a part of the Doha Development Agenda. Trade facilitation includes measures to improve transparency. This paper examines the recent overall negotiations, and the various proposals Members have made to improve transparency in the context of the trade facilitation negotiation and GATT Article X. Further, the paper suggests some policy recommendations for Korea.Trade Facilitation, WTO, Transparency

제목: 통화통합의 무역증진효과 분석
초록:
This paper aims to clarify channels through which monetary integration promotes economic integration. In particular, it analyzes whether monetary integration has trade promotion effects in the case of Europe using a gravity model. The bilateral trade between two countries is explained using explanatory variables such as GDP and per capita income of two countries, distance between the two, and dummy variables on similarity of their languages and location.
Our empirical analysis shows that the gravity model predicts bilateral trade quite well; the coefficients of explanatory variables have the expected signs and are statistically significant. Moreover, the variable representing monetary integration consistently has a positive effect on the size of bilateral trade. The use of exchange rate regime as its alternative implies that bilateral trade increases as the exchange rate between two currencies becomes more stable.
Our analysis also shows that the choice of fixed exchange rate regime by East Asian countries has the similar trade promoting effects. Monetary integration of two countries has a positive effect on trade between the two. East Asian countries need to pursue closer financial and monetary cooperation to promote regional economic integration.This paper aims to clarify channels through which monetary integration promotes economic integration. 제목: 글로벌 전자무역시스템의 도입에 따른 은행의 대응과 마케팅 전략
초록:
The Purpose of this study is to propose the effective marketing strategy for creating the profitable business models of the Bank joining in the international trade transaction under Global e-Trade environment. e-Trading system has been introducing into around the world to provide trading companies with an efficient and safe mechanism to realize business deals via computer. 
As this e-Trade system newly introduced in international trade, the Banks are much at the risks of missing a very big opportunity if they don't focus on how they can provide services to e-Trading market. It may reduces the work for bank: it gives trading companies access to the data so that they can see the status of the business process. that is, the foundation for the revenue of trading fields can be cut down because some system take over the business of the Bank. 
So, the Bank should set up the competitive marketing strategy for generating new revenue models under e-Business infrastructure environment. First, Banks should create their own propriety business information system and integrate global one stop e-trading system available between all the parties concerned for international trade that will carry out business in a seamless and streamlined transaction process. Second, Bank should develop new business models for generating the source of earings under e-Trading System. and Bank need to make an effort to take the initiative of Financial Supply Chain Management under e-Trade system.The Purpose of this study is to propose the effective marketing strategy for creating the profitable business models of the Bank joining in the international trade transaction under Global e-Trade environment. e-Trading system has been introducing into around the world to provide trading companies with an efficient and safe mechanism to realize business deals via computer.

Second, Bank should develop new business models for generating the source of earings under e-Trading System. and Bank need to make an effort to take the initiative of Financial Supply Chain Management under e-Trade system.e-Trade, Financial Supply Chain, Marketing Strategy

제목: 장보고 해상 무역활동의 재평가와 글로별 경영의 미래 비전
초록:
The purpose of this article is to reevaluate activities of the King of Maritime Trade, Chang Pogo, and his key success factors, and suggest the future vision of global management.
 Chang Pogo's Cheonghaejin established an international network among Korea, China, and Japan through private trade and had an active trading relationship with Aravian merchants.
 Through combining military, manufacturing, and commerce, he presented a new model of trade and business for various fields and made Korea the trading hub of Northeast Asia.
 His key success factors of the maritime activities are described such as innovative and business mind including entrepreneurship, establishment of global network. global management and the shared value with Buddism.The purpose of this article is to reevaluate activities of the King of Maritime Trade, Chang Pogo, and his key success factors, and suggest the future vision of global management.

 His key success factors of the maritime activities are described such as innovative and business mind including entrepreneurship, establishment of global network. global management and the shared value with Buddism.Chang Pogo, Cheonghaejin, International Network, Key Success Factors, Vision Of Global Management

제목: 리스트의 보호무역의 사상과 이론에 관한 연구
초록:
In the nineteenth century, Friedlich List (1789-1846) was a leading economist in Germany. He published Four books "Wider Die Unberentze der Bauernguter (1816)", "Outlines of American Political Economy(1827)", "Die Ackerverfassung, die Zwergwirt- schaft und die Auswanderug(1842)", "Das Nationale System der Politischen Oekono- mies(1841)", and "Die Politisch- Oecononisch Nationaleinheit der Deutschen (1945-6)".
In his book, "Das Nationale System der Politischen Oekonomies(1841)", List commented on British liberalism and the free trade of Adam Smith's book "An Inquiry into Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations(1776)". List argued tha t a protection was necessary for the harmony and balance among agriculture, manufacture, and commerce to develop national economy for the lower economic development countries, for example, France, United States, and Germany in the nineteenth century. In his international trade theory, List proposed that the lower economic development countries should be necessary for political independent with protectionism to develop national economy. 
In particular, Bismark(1815-1898), prime minister, in Germany adopted List`s thoughts and theory to harmonize discord of the German people. 
The purpose of this study is to provide the economic thought and theory that use for developing the basic concept of the political and economic harmony of Korean peninsular. This study introduced List`s theory and examined that List had involved the movement of protectionism with commenting on British liberalism in the United States and France. Also, this study examined a formation of Adam Smith`s theory and reviewed a development of List's economic thoughts in the nineteenth century.In the nineteenth century, Friedlich List (1789-1846) was a leading economist in Germany. He published Four books "Wider Die Unberentze der Bauernguter (1816)", "Outlines of American Political Economy(1827)", "Die Ackerverfassung, die Zwergwirt- schaft und die Auswanderug(1842)", "Das Nationale System der Politischen Oekono- mies(1841)", and "Die Politisch- Oecononisch Nationaleinheit der Deutschen (1945-6)".

In particular, Bismark(1815-1898), prime minister, in Germany adopted List`s thoughts and theory to harmonize discord of the German people. 
The purpose of this study is to provide the economic thought and theory that use for developing the basic concept of the political and economic harmony of Korean peninsular. This study introduced List`s theory and examined that List had involved the movement of protectionism with commenting on British liberalism in the United States and France. Also, this study examined a formation of Adam Smith`s theory and reviewed a development of List's economic thoughts in the nineteenth century.Friedrich List, Adam Smith, Wilhelm Ⅰ, Francois Quesnay, Jean Baptiste Colbert, Jean Baptiste Say, Alexander Hamilton, Daniel Raymond, Mathew Carey, Wangenheim,Wurtenberg, Reutlingen, Tubingen, Economic Thoughts, Trade, Trade Theory, Protection, Protectionism, Protectionist, Protective Powers, Liberalism

제목: 미주자유무역지대(FTAA)의 주요 쟁점사항에 관한 연구
초록: A Study on Major Issues of the Free Trade Area of the Americas(FTAA)- Focused on the Third Draft FTAA Agreement -Chong-Suk ParkKun-Ha HwangThe Free Trade of the Americas(FTAA) is one of the most important discussions in the US overseas commerce policy. It was started as the United States proposed the Enterprise for the Americas Initiative(EAI) in 1990. Currently, 34 nations in the American continents discuss the proposal. Accordingly, FTAA negotiation groups have worked to make a draft by sectors. After the first negotiation draft was announced in 2001, the Third Draft FTAA Agreement was released in 2003 to enhance transparency in the negotiation and induce active involvement of the major nations. If the FTAA is officially started in the future, it will be the world's largest free trade area, which will highly affect the non-members including South Korea. This study examines the general background of the FTAA and analyzes major issues in the third negotiation draft FTAA agreement to offer suggestions.FTAA, EAI, third draft, free trade area

제목: 국가별 전자무역의 비교와 시사점
초록:
This paper describes the characteristics and outline of overseas trade through Information Technology among countries (Korea, United States of America, Japan). The main focus of this paper is to conduct comparative analysis with approach manner among countries. 
In case of Korea, Korea's exports and imports have increased significantly after successful construction of an e-Trade platform operated by KTNET. In case of United States of America, The ACE is being developed to support the CBP mission of : (1) protecting the American public against terrorists and (2) fostering their Nation's economic security through lawful international trade and travel. In case of Japan, The Nippon Automated Cargo Clearance System was established in 1977 to promptly and accurately handle customs procedures and other tasks related to international cargo and shipment handling. The results are as follows ; 
First, To be successful e-Trade Platform, the Partnership(cooperation) between government and business community (several association parties like Manufacturer, Transporter, Bank, Customs Service, Insurance company, foreign affiliated bank etc.) is absolutely required. When Most of the government and business community attended the e-trade platform, e-trade will come into effect. To ensure that KTNET has an adequate supply of user to fulfill our e-Trade network, it may be necessary to improve benefits, cut cost or both.
Second, To activate e-Trade platform, it is important to establish close cooperation between nations. e-Trade platform can achieve best results in the simplification of procedures and cost savings when an international linkage is established. and close cooperation with International Organization, especially World Customs Organization.This paper describes the characteristics and outline of overseas trade through Information Technology among countries (Korea, United States of America, Japan). 제목: 동아시아 국가의 무역수지와 거시경제 충격
초록: We paper applied Mundell-Fleming model from Clarida, Gali(1994), and Eswar S. Prasad(1999) to analyze the fluctuating reason of the trade balance in response to different types of macroeconomic shocks. In this process, we construct SVAR model of long-run output, real effective exchange rate, and trade balance fluctuation and identify four shocks of supply shock, demand shock, and nominal shock. Indeed, the effectiveness of these shocks is divided into two channels which are the exchange rate channel and the output channel and the exchange rate channel is divided by the price effect and the capital flow effect. The estimation result suggests that the nominal shock has an important role in the improvement of trade balance in 4 Asian countries. Moreover, the exchange rate channel has make more influence on trade balance than the output channel. We also conclude that the capital flow effect is more important than the price effect in the exchange rate channel.Trade Balance, SVAR, Supply Shock, Demand Shock, Nominal Shock

제목: 한·미 무역구조 유형화를 통한 대미 수출경쟁력 분석
초록: This paper aims to present a framework for categorizing and evaluating the competitive position of key products in order to maximize export values and volumes to the United States and the World. Key products are divided into 7 groups by using Ward cluster method based on TSI(Trade Specification Index) matrix values. Also, 7 groups are categorized into two sectors; comparative advantage sector and comparative disadvantage sector, by the three factors; TSI, measures of dynamic comparative advantage, and export market share and growth rate of each product. Comparative advantage sector consists of two patterns of having successful price competitiveness and decreasing comparative level despite price competitiveness. Comparative disadvantage sector includes two patterns of deficit quality competitiveness and price competitiveness. As a result of that, decision makers should have different trade policy for each pattern to maximize competitiveness in trade with the United States.Korean Trade Pattern, Dynamic Comparative Advantage, Trade Specification Index, Ward Cluster Method

제목: 동아시아 역내무역과 물류네트워크에 관한 연구
초록:
Resent East Asian economic growth has lead the increase of global trade volume and global logistics to the level of full-scale development as aiming to have quantitative growth in world trades in one hand and increasing mutual dependence among the East Asian Economic Bloc on the other.
In other words, East Asian economic current growth is going along as connecting with 2 different process that are the increase of global trade volume and the technical development of global logistics system. And mutual dependence among the East Asian Economic Bloc shows the deepening trend in production and consumption.
While having the flow of expansion in East Asian trade volume and logistics network in mind, this paper will study on trend in East Asian intra-trade and then study on change & tasks in the East Asian Logistics system.East Asian intra-trade, East Asian logistics network,logistics network-tasks

제목: 한국 제조업의 무역자유화에 대한 저항가능성 측정: 정치경제학적 관점
초록:
The Korean government has been actively pursuing its trade policy geared towards creation of a more open market. However, these policies are, at times,being impeded by interest groups concerned about economic damage should these policies be implemented. The Korean government has paid scant tention to strategies of interest groups until now; but if the government, as a provider of policies, can predict behavior of interest groups in advance, it would be able to implement its trade liberalization policy much more efficiently.
In this context, the purpose of this paper is to measure levels of political resistance that various Korean industries would mount against trade liberalization.
This paper analyzes Korea’s manufacturing industries utilizing data from KSIC (Korea Standard Industry Code) two digits. By measuring the potential benefit of voices and perceived chances of success by industry, this paper identifies the industry group that is most likely to affect political resistance to trade liberalization. The conclusions of this paper can provide a point of reference when the government introduces the policy of trade liberalization. If the government takes political variables, along with economic variables, into consideration to predict behavior of interest groups, it could increase the efficiency in promotion and implementation of its trade liberalization policies.Trade Liberalization, Interest Groups, Political Economy

제목: 글로벌 전자무역에서 SWIFT의 TSU BPO의도입과 과제
초록:
SWIFT has designed Trade Services Utility(TSU) to meet the new paradigm of electronic trade. The Trade Services Utility is a matching and workflow application that sits on the SWIFT network. The TSU is designed to help banks offer advanced supply chain services to their corporate customers who are involved in open account trading. Nowadays, the Bank payment obligation(BPO) can optionally be included in a baseline by mutual consent. The BPO is an irrevocable and conditional obligation of an obligor bank(buyers bank) to pay a specified amount to seller's bank according to an established baseline of a single TSU transaction.
Therefore, SWIFT enables its customers to automate and standardise financial transactions, thereby lowering costs, reducing operational risk and eliminating inefficiencies from their operations. Whereas, Banks can use the core functionality of the Trade Services Utility to offer competitive services that complement existing services. But SWIFT need to come up with the measures of activating the TSU BPO.
So, this paper is to introduce TSU BPO and check the measures for the activation of the TSU BPO under the electronic trade environment.SWIFT has designed Trade Services Utility(TSU) to meet the new paradigm of electronic trade. The Trade Services Utility is a matching and workflow application that sits on the SWIFT network. The TSU is designed to help banks offer advanced supply chain services to their corporate customers who are involved in open account trading.
